I wake up with smooth, pillowy lips instead of the dry, cracked mess I used to have by morning. The Berry scent is soft and sweet and the formula feels rich without being sticky ğŸ“ğŸ’•What makes it work so well is the combo of vitamin C, murumuru and shea butter, and antioxidants. It seals in moisture, softens peeling lips, and repairs damage while you sleep, no effort required. That rich texture isnâ€™t just for looks, it actually helps create a moisture barrier so everything stays locked in until morning.Itâ€™s become a nightly staple, especially if Iâ€™ve been wearing matte lipstick or dealing with dry weather. Even when Iâ€™ve forgotten to drink enough water (oops), this still saves me. A tiny amount goes a long way, I usually take a small scoop with the little spatula and apply it into my lips right before bed. You donâ€™t need to pile it on.Hereâ€™s a quick tip if youâ€™re new to lip masks: make sure your lips are clean and dry before applying, and press the product in gently with your finger or the applicator so it absorbs evenly. If you exfoliate beforehand, the results are even better ğŸ’¦ğŸ›ï¸My lips feel insanely soft by morning. sample_reviews.text:
After a couple days of random cold weather in a state where itâ€™s usually hot and humid, my skin became dehydrated AND congested. I finally decided to try this stuff out after seeing it constantly trend on tiktok and I am so glad I did! My skin no longer feels tight and the congestion of little bumps on my forehead have almost gone away. I also noticed my makeup looked more smooth and flawless when it would look cakey and flaky before! Even though it is a little pricey, itâ€™s worth it!! All I did was use water to wash my face in the morning (oil cleanser at night), tone, snail mucin, and moisturizer!Update: itâ€™s been almost 3 weeks of using this daily (morning and night) and itâ€™s become a STAPLE in my everyday routine. Iâ€™ve always had tiny closed comedones on the sides of my cheeks that never went away for years and because this serum is completely restoring my barrier, my skin was finally able to push out all the enclosed sebum and the comedones have been rubbing off when I wash my face ever since!

Itâ€™s incredibly lightweight, absorbs quickly, and layers effortlessly with the rest of my products. The texture is a little slimy at first, but I got over that quickly because of how well it sinks in and how hydrating it feels.What keeps me coming back is how much smoother and less blotchy my skin looks with consistent use. It gives my skin a healthy, hydrated glow without clogging pores or irritating sensitive, hormonal skin.If you want something gentle, effective, and easy to work into any routine, this serum is such a reliable boost for texture and hydration. slipp

usage_contexts.context: ë©”ì´í¬ì—… ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ë° í”¼ë¶€ í…ìŠ¤ì²˜ ê°œì„

sample_reviews.text:
At 32 I had stubborn hormonal acne and dry flaky skin (thanks in part to the dry climate in Colorado) I was tired of constantly fighting my skin and embarked on a journey to get the clear youthful skin I deserved. I was pleased to find that the skin of my dreams in a Korean beauty inspired routine. The best part is that nearly all the products I tried were relatively inexpensive and readily available from amazon. My acne is non-existent now and the tone and texture of my skin is so supple and smooth. I have provided a list of my routine below which includes  this product. Iâ€™m not saying this is the best or only way to achieve my results, I just thought others would be interested in what I used.*indicates review for this productAM- hydrating, lightweight, works under makeupCleanser - BOOTS Botanics All Bright Gentle Cleansing Cream (purchased from Ulta for a fraction of the price $6.99)First Toner- Mario Badescu Facial Spray with Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater, 4 oz.â€“ $7.00 - This is like a drink of water for your face. I love this stuff and will spray again randomly throughout the day whenever I need a refresher. The aroma is a little strong for my liking but (almost like perfume) but Iâ€™m willing to overlook since the rose and aloe does so much for my skin. I used to use just straight rose water which has a very present smell but I like the spray delivery of this product better.Moisturizing Toner-[Skin Food] Premium Avocado Rich Toner 180ml â€“$12.98 -  I canâ€™t say enough about this. Itâ€™s a nice thick toner much more substantial that the western watery toners I was used to. The smell of this is very bright and green (thatâ€™s the best way I can think of to explain it) I love the smell! Every now and then I will smell it on my face and it gives me an invigorating boost. This toner works well to moisturize and calm my skin and will certainly be re-purchasing. A little goes a long way with this stuff so that wonâ€™t be for quite some time!Treatment- Body Merry Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Anti-aging with Vitamic C and Natural Green Tea, 2 Ozâ€“ $13.99 - I use this during the day to keep my skin feeling hydrated and give my skin the boost of anti-oxidants to help combat ageing. This is a lightweight serum (which is why I use it under my makeup) but it does take some time to fully absorb in and dry on my skin. After I put this on I generally go and have breakfast before coming back to finish. The aroma leans more towards green tea which again I find refreshing for the morning. The syrup is a milky and slightly viscous with minimal stickiness.Eye Cream- Loreal Revitalift Eye Cream 0.5 Ounce (14ml) (14ml) â€“ (Purchased  from Ulta)Face Cream- [MIZON] Snail Recovery Gel Cream 45ml (1.52 fl.oz.) Pack of 2â€“ $9.99/ 2-pack  - Lightweight moisturizer which works perfectly under makeup. This product doesnâ€™tâ€™ have much of a smell. The consistency is unique halfway between a gel and a cream. Glides on smoothly and provides a decent amount of hydration when combines with my other hydrating products. I donâ€™t like to use occlusive products during the day and this moisturizer fits the bill.PM-all about Snail- Repair, Hydrated, MoisturizeMakeup Remover- Boots Botanics All Bright Soothing Eye Make-up Remover 5 oz. â€“ Purchased at Ulta for a fraction of the price - $6.99Double Cleanse -[Total 2Pcs] The Face Shop Rice Water Bright Cleansing Oil + Foam SET â€“$14.21 -  The oil cleanser feels light and silky. At night, I massage 1 pump into my skin and works well to dissolve the days make-up. Once I am done breaking down all the makeup, I use water to get some of it off before moving to the foam cleanser. My only complaint is that the fragrance is a little strong and can burn my eyes if Iâ€™m not careful. It leaves my skin feeling soft and clean. The foam cleanser works well to clean off the oil left on my face. The foam cleanser aroma is a lot more tolerable to me. It comes out of the tube a shimmery white color and is Very gentle. These two cleansers work well to get my face clean and ready for treatments without that typical tight feeling. They leave my skin soft and moisturized.Exfoliation -  Olay Regenerist Microdermabrasion & Peel System Microdermabrasion Treatment 1 Kit - $21.99 - one a week - I used to use philosophy's microderm kit but this one offers the same exact results for 1/2 of the price. This exfoliator leaves my skin feeling baby soft but it does seem a tad harsh so I don't like to use it too frequently. I love the fresh citrus smell of the crystals and the warming foaming action once you put on the activator. Since I only use this once a week it lasts for a VERY long time and is totally worth the price.Toner- [Skin Food] Premium Avocado Rich Toner 180ml â€“$12.98  I canâ€™t say enough about this. Itâ€™s a nice thick toner much more substantial that the western watery toners I was used to. The smell of this is very bright and green (thatâ€™s the best way I can think of to explain it) I love the smell! Every now and then I will smell it on my face and it gives me an invigorating boost. This toner works well to moisturize and calm my skin and will certainly be re-purchasing. A little goes a long way with this stuff so that wonâ€™t be for quite some time!*Essence - [Cosrx] Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence 100ml â€“ $15.85 - I only use this at night because it does leave bit of a film on my face which I find unpleasant under make up. It dries quickly and a single pump gives me enough to cover my whole face and neck. There is no smell to speak of but it does have a slimy snail-y texture ( it is 96% slime!) and can be a bit tacky once its all said and done.  I have also used this on some iron burns to help it heal faster and minimize scaring with a lot of success.Treatment-MIZON Snail Repair Intensive Ampoule - Anti Wrinkle - Multi Function Formula - $11.43 -  Anti Wrinkle - Multi Function Formula- Clear viscous liquid. Not nearly as slimy as the essence. No smell, absorbs quickly. I focus heavily on the snail products at night because I read that the copper peptides naturally contained in the snail canalter the effectiveness of the vitamin C and vice versa.Spot Treatment-[MIZON] Acence Blemish Out Pink Spot 30mlâ€“ $14.95 - Use only as needed â€“ Works wonders to diminish blemishes overnight. I used this quite frequently when I first started but after a while using all these products I didnâ€™t have any acne to speak of!Sheet Mask - Dermal Korea Collagen Essence Full Face Facial Mask Sheet, 16 Combo Pack â€“ $10.40 - I use once a week. I know that sheet masks are the totally hot thing in Korean beauty but I donâ€™t think they do much for me other than a relaxing home spa experience. I just donâ€™t see that they provide much and probably  will not be buying more.Eye Cream- MIZON Korean Cosmetics Snail Repair Eye Cream, 1 Ounce 1 Ounce â€“ $13.98 -  Light weight, absorbs quickly. The container is quite generous and a little will go a long way. I think I will have this for a while! It doesnâ€™t have any smell.Face Cream- MIZON Black Snail All In One Cream, 2.40 Ounce â€“$10.49 -  Like all of the Mizon Snail products I have tried this is a very easy introduction into the world of snail skin care. It has minimum smell and lightweight texture. Minimal slime factor, you wouldnâ€™t even know it was snail in a blind comparison.  It has a off white color and a lightweight consistency. It doesnâ€™t work wall as an occlusive if thatâ€™s what you want you may need to add a different moisturizer at night.Face Oils- I use a mixture of two oils applied at once: Radha Beauty Rosehip Oil 4 oz - 100% Pure Cold Pressed Certified Organic. - $13.95 -  and Radha Beauty Moroccan Argan Oil for Hair, Face & Skin 4 oz - USDA Organic 100% Pure Cold pressed Virgin Oil From Morocco - By Radha Beauty â€“$12.95 -  I like to use the oils last because I feel like it really seals everything in and provides moisture to last me through the night. The rosehip oil is very yellow orange so I wouldnâ€™t recommend using during the day abut I do sometimes mix the Argan oil in with my foundation if I want a dewier look.
  
Read more

products.product: Aquaphor Lip Repair Stick, Moisturizing Lip Balm P

usage_contexts.context: ê²¨ìš¸ì²  ê±´ì¡°í•˜ê³  ê°ˆë¼ì§„ ì…ìˆ  ë³´í˜¸ ë° íšŒë³µ

sample_reviews.text:
Iâ€™ve been using the Aquaphor Lip Repair Stick for a few weeks now, and itâ€™s quickly become my go-to lip balm. Hereâ€™s my review:Moisturizing & Hydration:This lip balm is incredibly moisturizing and does an excellent job of keeping my lips soft and hydrated. I suffer from dry, chapped lips, especially during the colder months, and the Aquaphor Lip Repair Stick provides immediate relief. It has a rich, thick formula that isnâ€™t greasy, but it locks in moisture for hours. I donâ€™t need to reapply it constantly, which is a huge plus.Texture & Application:The texture is smooth and soothing, gliding easily over my lips without feeling sticky or heavy. It has a non-waxy feel, which I really appreciate. It absorbs quickly and leaves my lips feeling nourished without any residue. The stick form is easy to apply and mess-free, so itâ€™s perfect for on-the-go use.Effectiveness:Aquaphor is known for its healing properties, and this lip repair stick lives up to the brandâ€™s reputation. It works wonders on cracked or irritated lips, providing immediate relief and helping to heal them faster. Whether Iâ€™m dealing with winter dryness or a bit of sunburn, it soothes and repairs quickly.Scent & Flavor:Thereâ€™s no overwhelming scent or flavor, which I actually prefer. Itâ€™s very neutral, so itâ€™s great for those who donâ€™t want a heavily scented or flavored lip product. The lack of scent also makes it ideal for men and women alike, as itâ€™s not too sweet or perfumed.Packaging:The packaging is simple and functional. The twist-up mechanism works smoothly, and the cap stays secure, so I donâ€™t have to worry about it coming off in my bag. Itâ€™s compact and portable, making it easy to throw in my purse or pocket for quick use throughout the day.Drawbacks:One minor drawback is that itâ€™s a bit thicker than other lip balms, so if youâ€™re looking for something that feels lighter or more matte, this might not be your top pick. Additionally, while itâ€™s great for repairing dry lips, I wouldnâ€™t necessarily use it as a daily lip balm if I wanted something with a more cosmetic finish or a hint of color.Final Thoughts:Overall, Iâ€™m really impressed with the Aquaphor Lip Repair Stick. Itâ€™s highly effective, hydrating, and provides long-lasting relief for dry, cracked lips. If you suffer from chapped lips or need something that helps heal and protect your lips, this is a must-try. Itâ€™s become my favorite go-to lip treatment, especially in the colder months!
  
Read more

usage_contexts.context: ì¼ìƒì ì¸ ì…ìˆ  ë³´ìŠµ ë° ê´€ë¦¬

sample_reviews.text:
Iâ€™m a long-time Aquaphor customer and like basics without extra junk. At back-to-school I bought seven sticksâ€”one for each grandchildâ€”because fall wind + kids who lick their lips = chapping fast. This balm is fragrance-free, gentle, and doesnâ€™t sting. It goes on smoothly, no weird taste, not super glossy, and it actually softens cracked lips fast. I keep extras in coats and backpacks.Why Iâ€™m comfortable giving it to the kids: the stick uses simple moisturizers like jojoba oil, shea butter, and castor oil, plus panthenol and vitamins C & E. In plain English, these ingredients add moisture and then seal it in so lips stay calm instead of getting more irritated. No parabens, no fragrance, no menthol/camphor â€œtingle.â€

The Aquaphor Lip Repair Stick works incredibly well. It goes on smooth, feels lightweight, and gives instant moisture without being greasy. My lips stay soft for hours, even in cold or dry weather.

The formula feels smooth and hydrating without being greasy, and the natural beeswax base gives it a rich, protective layer that really helps in both cold and hot weather. It also lasts a good while on the lips, so youâ€™re not constantly reapplying like with some other brands. sample_reviews.text:
Love these. I like the peppermint zing of it when my lips are dry. Softens my lips and moisturizes them.
  
Read more

Although vaseline is the more affordable, simpler version to moisturise your lips, I adore Burt's Bees Lip Balms, vitamin e and peppermint being one of my favourites. This is cheaper (in Aus at least) than from any chemist (inc. chemist warehouse) (chemists sell it individually, 4 - 6 each) If you know you like Burt's Bees and plan to use many more, I suggest you buy this 4 pack (I used 1 lipbalm in more or less a year, but these have long expiry dates) But let's say you didn't like Burt's Bees. Well then, please understand that this lipbalm is natural and (I think?) healthy. The reason I would not use vaseline (plain petroleum gel) is because it is not very convenient, but I do suggest using vaseline overnight and this lighter lipbalm during the day. The different flavours are extremely fun to use (coconut and pear is amazing too!) but the original vitamin e and peppermint is definitely an essential.

sample_reviews.text:
Iâ€™ve been really happy with Aquaphor Lip Repair Ointment and itâ€™s one of the most reliable things Iâ€™ve found for truly dry lips. It feels more like a treatment than a regular chapstick. Instead of being waxy and disappearing quickly, it goes on smoothly and forms a protective layer that helps lock in moisture, so my lips stay comfortable for a long time.Itâ€™s especially helpful when my lips are cracked from cold weather, dry air, or just getting dehydrated. Iâ€™ll put a layer on and I can actually feel the difference pretty quickly, less tightness and less flaking. I also like using it before bed, and when I wake up my lips still feel soft instead of dried out again.The pack is convenient too because I can keep one in my purse and one at home. Overall, itâ€™s a great value for something that actually works, and Iâ€™d definitely repurchase if you deal with dryness often.

sample_reviews.text:
I have spent a small fortune on lip balms over the years. Earlier this year I discovered Aquaphor and both my partner and I are in love with it. It's literally perfect, and it's cheap. No fragrance or color, so that's a huge plus. It works really well as an overnight lip mask, too. I thought I was permanently cursed with chapped lips but I'd just been using stuff that didn't work well enough before, as even the more expensive lip balms didn't make much of a difference. This stuff actually IMPROVED the annoying dry skin situation with my lips instead of just making my lips FEEL better.
  
Read more

Iâ€™ve been really happy with Aquaphor Lip Repair Ointment and itâ€™s one of the most reliable things Iâ€™ve found for truly dry lips. It feels more like a treatment than a regular chapstick. Instead of being waxy and disappearing quickly, it goes on smoothly and forms a protective layer that helps lock in moisture, so my lips stay comfortable for a long time.Itâ€™s especially helpful when my lips are cracked from cold weather, dry air, or just getting dehydrated. Iâ€™ll put a layer on and I can actually feel the difference pretty quickly, less tightness and less flaking. I also like using it before bed, and when I wake up my lips still feel soft instead of dried out again.The pack is convenient too because I can keep one in my purse and one at home. Overall, itâ€™s a great value for something that actually works, and Iâ€™d definitely repurchase if you deal with dryness often.

skin felt incredibly soft, hydrated, and glowy

sample_reviews.text:
I bought the four-pack and shared it with my husband. Using a hydrogel mask was an interesting experience; on my first try, the mask actually tore when I took it out, but by the second use I got the hang of it. I wore it overnight for about eight hours, and my skin looked noticeably more dewy and refreshed in the morning. I later read that wearing a mask for that long may not be ideal for oily/acne prone skin because it can trap assess oil and clog pores, but so far, after two uses, it seems to be working ok for me. I might try another Biodance mask next time, just not the pink one.
  
Read more

The Biodance Collagen Masks feel amazing on the skinâ€”super soothing and luxurious. After using one, my skin felt incredibly soft, hydrated, and glowy. Perfect for a quick skin refresh before makeup or as a self-care moment ğŸ’–

skin_concerns: ë ˆí‹°ë†€ ì‚¬ìš© í›„ í”¼ë¶€ ìê·¹

sample_reviews.text:
I have tried all four versions of this mask and I LOVE them all! I've been using them 1-3 times a month for about 6 months, and I feel like my skin is more plump, well-hydrated, and the texture has improved!I have acne and rosacea prone skin, and these are super gentle! I generally use them the same night I use my weekly retinoid treatment and it helps me avoid dry, flaky skin while still gaining all of the benefits of the retinol treatment. I always use them on long flights. Sometimes I use them just for a refresher... they are cooling on the skin for the first couple of hours, which is really nice on my redness-prone skin!The effects last several days, especially when the atmospheric humidity isn't low. There's not much of a smell at all, and they're easy enough to use! I like to wear it about an hour before I go to sleep... and I wake up glowing!
  
Read more

My initial encounter with these was until TikTok but I ordered them from Amazon for myself and my daughter for convenience and Prime shipping. There were two choices I think the one is a four-pack and the one I got is a 16 pack. The 16 pack will last you 4 months if you're doing it once a week as instructed.I open the top and two sides when I'm doing it just to have accessibility and to be able to use the remnants liquid in the pack after I'm done applying the facial part I put the liquid in the pack on my neck and chest.They are a little slippery when you take them out. I watched a video on how to apply it and did the bottom part first and then the top part sometimes I have to snip the top part near the nose to get it to fit properly but you don't have to in general.There are three pieces that are left over the two eye pieces and the lip piece. You can put them below your eyes or above your eyes on your brows and then put the mask over them which is what I do. Or you can put them under your eyes and put the mask over them but I find it doesn't absorb all the way in that location due to the double thickness I guess. The lip one you can put over your lip or put it on vertically over your throat where the skin can get a little saggy.Once you have it on it's best to sit back and relax for 30 minutes or so at about a 45Â° angle so it doesn't slip off. After about 10 to 15 minutes it doesn't slip around as much and after 30 it's obviously started absorbing and tends to stay pretty well.I haven't noticed any staining on the pillows or anything like that from it and by morning actually by 4 hours later it's completely absorbed and all you have left on your faces the plastic that it was attached to. You just pull that off and throw it away. It's white when you put it on and it's clear when it absorbs.I definitely noticed an improvement in my skin quality and the collagen sinks in easily and less about a week. I am a redhead with delicate skin and I haven't had any reaction to this product at all I know that other masks have caused problems for friends but I've used this one for over a year now and I love it. My daughter and I both use it weekly and they're easy to take with you if you're traveling great way to pamper your skin after a day outside on the beach.The price is reasonable for what it is and what it does. I've gotten several compliments on my skin and I'm over 60 so that saying something for the results!All in all this is a very good product, it doesn't smell and doesn't seem to have any impurities like some others. My skin isn't irritated by it and looks great afterwards. If you're wondering if it washes off once it's soaked in you can wash your face all you want but you're just going to have beautiful glowing cheeks. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this or give it as a gift!
  
Read more
